alert.note: Alert for Bedford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bedford County through 900 PM EDT... At 830 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking two strong thunderstorms over Bedford, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bedford... Huddleston... Forest... Goode... Peaks Of Otter Summit... Thaxton... and Sedalia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
